alert.note: Alert for Palo Pinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 11:41PM CDT until May 12 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN PALO PINTO COUNTY... At 1141 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lake Palo Pinto, or 20 miles southwest of Mineral Wells, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gordon, Lake Palo Pinto, Strawn, Mingus, Lone Camp and Santo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
